title: Intelligent Services JourneyAI Send Time Optimization
description: This mixin contains JourneyAI Send Time Optimization scores, which provides the time preferences for message deliveries.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: journeyAI
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: JourneyAI intelligent services provides various insights about message deliveries along customer's journey

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: sendTimeOptimization
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: Journey AI Send Time Optimization scores provide the time preferences for message deliveries. Higher score means a better outcome is expected, if a message sent at the corresponding hour.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: emailSendTimeOptimization
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: Send Time Optimization scores for email channel

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: emailSendTimeScoreForClick
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: scores for 7*24 hours from GMT Monday hour 0 to Sunday hour 23, representing the inclination of the customer clicking on an email's link if it's sent at that hour

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: emailSendTimeScoreForOpen
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: scores for 7*24 hours from GMT Monday hour 0 to Sunday hour 23, representing the inclination of the customer opening an email if it's sent at that hour

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: pushSendTimeOptimization
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: Send Time Optimization scores for push channel

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: pushSendTimeScoreForOpen
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: score for 7*24 hours from GMT Monday hour 0 to Sunday hour 23, representing the inclination of the customer opening a push notification if it's sent at that hour

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: sendTimeOptimizationScoreInfo
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: model version and score date as a concatenated string
